name: Dragonfang Greatsword
description: Forged from the fang of an ancient dragon. It hums with power.

name: Worldsplitter Axe
description: Each swing feels capable of shattering mountains.

name: Aegis of Eternity
description: A legendary armor said to be unbreakable.

name: Crown of the Immortal
description: A mythical crown granting both power and protection.
